steps.step: Scrape the batter into the pan(s).

Bake until the cake tester comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes. Cool the cake in the pan(s) on a rack for about 15 minutes before unmolding.You can make this cake 2-3 days ahead for the trifle; in fact its great if its a tiny bit stale.my roommate Caitlyns beautiful handiwork: a swan doggy bag for Alex
